Question: Kathryn served as Miss Golden Globe at the 2005 ceremony where she presented this person with an award for Million Dollar Baby.
Hints: The New Yorker wrote that, unlike this person,.
The film earned this person a fee of $400,000 (US$2.64 million in 2013 dollars) and 25 percent of its net box-office takings.
As of 2012[update], In the Line of Fire was the last film this person acted in that he did not direct.
